exec forge scan .
cmp stdout golden_1.txt

exec forge scan --enumerate .
cmp stdout golden_1_enum.txt

exec forge scan --absolute .
cmpenv stdout golden_2.txt

exec forge scan --absolute --enumerate .
cmpenv stdout golden_2_enum.txt

-- golden_1.txt --
{".":["foo","bar"]}
-- golden_1_enum.txt --
[".+bar",".+foo"]
-- golden_2.txt --
{"$WORK":["foo","bar"]}
-- golden_2_enum.txt --
["$WORK+bar","$WORK+foo"]
-- Earthfile --
VERSION 0.7

foo:
  LET bar = baz

bar:
  LET bar = baz
